special_text:
[i](Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.)[/i]
Nonbasic lands lose all land types and abilities and have “{T}: Add {C}” and “{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color.”
{B}{R} Page 6
{3}{R}, {T}, Exile [i]Tower of Skalathak[/i]: Destroy target land. Activate only as a sorcery.
{R}{G} Page 13
{T}, Sacrifice [i]Tower of Skalathak[/i]: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
